DPRK Women's Football Team Beats Its Irish Rival 
   Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team trounced its Irish rival 3-0 on Aug. 7 in the preliminaries of the 24th World University Games now under way in Thailand.
